meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by celiac disease.
meanings.sent1: The celiac patient needed to follow a strict gluten-free diet.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that a celiac diet excludes gluten.
meanings.sent3: The celiac cat refused to eat any food with gluten.
meanings.sent4: Her celiac condition made her body react strongly to gluten.
meanings.sent5: The celiac symptoms were triggered by even the smallest amount of gluten.

meanings.definition: A person who has celiac disease.
meanings.sent1: The celiac visited a nutritionist for dietary advice.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a celiac and cannot eat wheat products.
meanings.sent3: The celiac at the party brought their own gluten-free snacks.
meanings.sent4: As a celiac, he always checks food labels for gluten content.
meanings.sent5: The celiac's health improved after switching to a gluten-free lifestyle.

meanings.definition: An autoimmune disorder affecting the small intestine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with celiac after running tests.
meanings.sent2: Celiac damages the small intestine's ability to absorb nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The celiac's small intestine was sensitive to gluten.
meanings.sent4: Living with celiac means being cautious about food choices.
meanings.sent5: The celiac's immune system mistakenly attacks the small intestine.
